attributes.action: Award himself Free Monthly Eye Tests
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We implore the Prime Minister to award himself free monthly eye tests, to correct any vision impairments and let him see clearly, what many others can see very clearly - the huge damage that he personally has done to the British Economy.

1) Destruction of Private Pensions

2) Dumping of half the nations gold     reserves at the bottom of the market

3) Destruction of confidence in Sterling

4) Destruction of wealth of prudent savers

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
